Desc.entry: Offers a counselling service to anyone within South Yorkshire/Derbyshire and surrounding area. Offers one-to-one counselling as well as group work in the area of stress/anxiety, depression, relationships and work-based problems. In group work, offers a stress management course and a relaxation therapy service. There is a charge for the service - details on request. Also runs 'My Time' which is an art and craft workshop designed to help people relax and have fun (this is not a therapy group). Please contact Janice or check the website for further details. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs various times, by appointment only. Various Saturdays ('My Time')

Telephone.entry: Mon-Thurs various times, by appointment only. Various Saturdays ('My Time')
